# Travel Milestone

> Your personal travel assistant. Get smart insights, live weather updates, offline maps, and personalized tips for India's most incredible destinations.

## Main Pages
- [Home](https://www.piratesdroid.com/index.html): Discover incredible India, featured destinations and search.
- [Places](https://www.piratesdroid.com/places.html): Explore famous, natural, religious, and ancient places.
- [Forts](https://www.piratesdroid.com/forts.html): Discover majestic historic forts across India.
- [Travel Blog](https://www.piratesdroid.com/blogs.html): Insights, guides, and stories from experts.
- [Mobile App](https://www.piratesdroid.com/app.html): Download the Travel Milestone app for on-the-go assistance.
- [Pincode Search](https://www.piratesdroid.com/pincode.html): Find location details and pincodes.

## About Travel Milestone
Travel Milestone is a comprehensive guide to India's top travel destinations. Founded by Sushil Kambli and Co-Founded by Swapnali Kambli, the platform aims to connect travelers with the rich culture and heritage of India.

## Contact
- Email: piratesdroid46@gmail.com
